cause.description:
Imran Khan is indeed an honest & a brave man. The collapse of the entire Pakistan system into the hands of bandits like MQM (supported by the government) was clearly observed on 12th May 2007. The whole world had witnessed such a cruelty...
Please support Imran & his team in eliminating the menace from the society... We all want him to become the Prime Minister of Pakistan, so that honesty, justice, & truth could flourish...
1. Improve the entire system of Pakistan, which is in Happ-hazzard.
2. Free education.
3. jobs, free & quick dispension of justice, etc.
cause.mission: Change & Improve the Entire System of Pakistan
cause.name: Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaaf
